name: 7 Bullets (to Kill Genghis Khan) Concept Alpha
name_original: 7 Bullets (to Kill Genghis Khan) Concept Alpha
description:
"7 Bullets" is an idea that came to me while waking up one morning: To hunt down Genghis Khan with a large caliber revolver. Obviously, being in ancient Mongolia, ammunition would be limited, thus you would only have 7 bullets to find and kill your target.

This sketch was made with the goal of reaching a fully playable concept phase within one month, including a level, enemies, and victory/loss conditions.

Genghis Khan wears red, and awaits in a temple at the top of the mountain. His soldiers lie between the two of you and will attack you on sight. Can you find and kill Genghis Khan with only 7 bullets in your gun?

Controls:
WASD to move, and mouse to look
Left Shift does a little dash
Space bar jumps
You can double jump, and dash while in the air
